content.detailedDescription: Driving down st rt 67 crossing i-75 in wapakoneta ohio .From uouiopolis ohio from where i am coming from to i-75 is about 7 miles ,i seen these lights but thought it was a new large billboard near i/75 ,closer i got the bigger it was till i got to i/75 from st rt 67 which crosses i-75.I was a large craft shaped liked triangle three four  large lights white .Setting over small pond water.Taking water somehow .High way state patrol setting looking at it .I slowed down and stopped under it .Off over pass it sat there a few more mins then took off slow like glidding no nose like it was black in color it was s low as i could have throw a rock up and hit it low.I was going to
content.summary: Ufo setting over small pond taking water in somehow ,just setting over interstate i-75 and st rt 67 ,highway state patrol setting watching it also ,i pasted by slow stopped ,i seen it for miles just setting there as i drove up to it .Setting obove hig

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was staying the night at my cousins house. we were messing around and looking out the window. when my cousin points out the window. what is that she asked me as she points. we both get up and go to the window and look out. there was a if i i. the north east very light just kinda moving slow.If started to speed up and within a few seconds it was almost to our house. we ran outside bumping into my other cousin and my uncle. being screamed at to go back to bed. as we got outside it is now over my house and my cousins house. my cousin uncle and i are starting at this thing.There were lights all around it. and within a few mins it zoomed off into the south east. toward lansing.It circled back around real fast and went back tiered lansing again.Were we scared. probably should have been.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fast hello goodbye we are here

content.detailedDescription: I recall it being summer 1976, sparta, wisconsin. six of us (ages 11-12) were late night fishing next to perch lake nearest to golf course. we had large sleeping bag opened up and we planned to sleep under the stars that evening. we lived nearby and back then our parents were not worried as it was the 70's, part of the culture then. my brother and one friend decided to walk home, they did not wish to campout or fish anymore. that left four of us at the site. as i looked to the stars to pass time i saw an object moving through the sky. i used a flashlight and was shinning it into the sky where i saw the object, albeit pretty high in the sky. i noticed it because it was moving rapidly, but had a low level light to it. i began flashing the light on and off into the sky when one of my remaining friends became scared and told me to stop doing it. this went on for about 3-4 minutes. i continued doing it until i no longer saw the light of the object. we then resumed what we were doing and talking, while sitting on the sleeping bag. the night was clear, weather was warm, no clouds, no wind. it was a hot night. we were situated under a large tree, probably about 30-50 feet in height. nearby there were smaller trees. as we sat there, the top portion of the tree began to blow and bend as is something were forcing it. we felt no wind sensation at all and as we looked around at nearby trees and bushes, nothing was moving, only the tree above us. all of a sudden streaks of colorful light shot across the top of the tree light being shot from a cannon. the lights were bright, many different colors. we had the tree top swaying above us while these lights streaked atop the tree. we were scared to death as we watched this for about 1-2 minutes. we could not believe what we were experiencing as there was absolutely no wind, no other trees or bushed were moving the slightest bit. we pulled our fishing lines in, grabbed poles, snacks, and everything we had. we tossed it in the center of the sleeping bag, all the time the lights continued streaking above us at the tree top level. each one of us four remaining persons grabbed a corner of the sleeping bag and ran as fast as we could. we went to the house where my brother and other friend had gone earlier. we told them what happened and we were very charged up. we eventually called the local police and an officer responded. although he seemed to believe us, he seemed to try to calm us down more than anything. i am not sure if he told us that others had seen or reported something or maybe that was just part of his efforts to calm us down. i am uncertain if there was a police report generated or if in fact the call was recorded back then, i never checked into it. we then went back to sleep on the front lawn of one of the guys houses. since this event, i have spoken to one of the other guys, years later as we were adults. he asked me if i remembered what had happened to us and i told him yes. he told me that he had never talked to anyone about it. i told him i understood. this friend died in 2005. i told my family about the incident of course after it had happened, but i had never talked about it again to the other friends that were with me that night. about a year ago, i sent the remaining two friends a face book message and asked them if they remembered the incident or wanted to talk. neither of them responded back to me. neither of them are computer savvy and really don't monitor their face book accounts at all. they both reside back in  wisconsin and i live now in arizona. my background includes 25+ years of law enforcement (police officer)  and i now work for the state of arizona as a criminal investigator. i find myself looking up into the night sky and on a few occasions, i have used a flashlight to shine into the sky. it is as if to say, i remember and/or i wish to know more about what happened to me all those years ago. almost like an invitation as strange as that sounds.
content.summary: Hovered above, shooting colored light blowing top of tree downward

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i where driving home and both saw a green cylinder shape object that turned in the sky then shot away like a bulet
content.summary: Green light in the sky that turned

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my parents in alabama smoking. it was an clear evening. no clouds. i was just looking up at the starts when i saw this bright light. 1st thought was an star or the int space station. but i'm saying that can't be. this light was moving fast real fast. ( now i grew up in the usaf. my father did (30)yrs so i know aircrafts). this thing all of an sudden came to a dead stop. i'm like that's no military aircrafts. then all of a sudden i had this strange filling that they knew i was watching them-then-it. it shot stright up like a rocket at an high rate if speed from a dead stop. i was never going to say anything until i was watching your shows hangar 1: the ufi files. if not for that i don't know if i would of said anything. your the 1st i have ever spoken of this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw an craft go from speed 2stop then shot stright up

content.detailedDescription: Waiting for my friends to leave the gym i was watching airplanes take off cuz it's by bna aiport in nashville, tn and in the distance i saw 3 objects hovering in a triangle formation... i tried to get video but you couldn't see them in the video... i think maybe the light was too bright from reflecting off the clouds... but it was very odd. as the clouds passed by i tried to find them again but they were gone.
content.summary: 3 objects hovering in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends apt on the balcony having a cigarette when i saw a very large triangle moving from the north over the building. it had six yellow lights on the bottom of the object that were large and just on. i watched it move across the sky at a slow pace and making no sounds what so ever. it moved south past the building and towards what we call the mountain which is just the upper part of the city up a hill. it was inline with a large star and then just disapeared. we have an airport in my city and can see planes taking off and landing from the balcony we can also hear them from that distance and this thing was just over top of me. i noticed it because of its shape size lights and the fact that it was close and made no sounds. i did not know what it was but i did know it was not any kind of plane i have ever seen. i was a military wife who's ex-husband was in the air force so i know what a plane looks like and sounds like. i was both fasinated and afraid. i called out to my friend to come and see it but she was on the phone and did not come out to see it. i was so confused with what i saw that i only told her what i saw. i know canada has no military planes as far as i know that look like that. but have seen pictures of the triangle plane the usa has so wasn't sure what i saw. would the us be flying thier plane over an ontario city? do they have the technology to create a silent plane. this thing was close enough i should have heard something. there was silence. as i said as it was heading south it just suddenly disapeared i did notice it vanished just before it was in line with the airport which would have been on its right hand side several miles away.
content.summary: Observed the very large silent triangle go from north to south at slow pace then just disapear.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was little at a time and i was playing outside in front yard up my grandmothers house where i live now and i was playing with my soccer ball i look up and i say this loving you i fell craft shovers at first and then i are still in amazement and i'm thinking all my goodness wasn't going to do and then starts getting lower and lower towards the house and help her write off my grandmother truth and when it gets on / off and goes back up to sky goes up cuz and just saps away like nothing ever happened
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange

content.detailedDescription: Ufo not sighted - visitation from entities on 3 seperate occasions.  i awoke with a scanning device going over my body - i saw the colors on the device and numbers.  i was unable to speak however there was communication between them and me.  another time i awoke with the feeling someone was in my room.  there were 3 beings and they were putting seeds across my body.  when i awoke the next morning i received a letter in the mail with the same seeds in a plastic bag. i expected to see hundreds of seeds in the bed however there were none.  i did find one seed that was stuck to my bottom cheek. the last one was awakening with pain in my thumb.  i saw a penlike instrument being injected into my thumb that held a tiny reddish brown cylinder.  if contacted by mufon i will go into detail as to all the encounters.  your form does not allow me to report accurately.  the events reported were at 2 separate addresses.
content.summary: I have had 3 separate visitations from entities from scanning of my body, purification and also inserting object into thumb.  i did not see a ufo - they just appeared in my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription:
A large, long triangle way up in atmosphere at night blocking out the stars behind it. it was totally silent with 3 red lights at each tip. the bottom was dark so it blended in with the nights sky. the only way i saw it was it was blocking out the stars. totally silent and went from west to east. it was so quick that by the time i said to the person i was with" hey look at that" it was gone. it was no optical illusion and there was no drugs or alcohol involved. i have been a sky gazer with a telescope for a long time. this happened in santa rosa california.
 
i have also seen a cigar shaped ufo over nuremberg germany in the mid eighties. this too was silent and just hovered way overhead for an hour. it was a dull beige color with no other features.

in 2011 i was working in an eyeglass shop in nc and a man came in in a trench coat on a summer day. he asked me to fix his glasses. as i was doing this i made small talk with him and he said " i appreciate your attempt to socialize but no more questions. he sounded just like a computer, he had to be a man in black. there is 2 power plants near the shop, one is coal and the other is nuclear.

i know what i have seen and none of these occurrences are made up or imagined.
content.summary: A large, long triangle way up in atmosphere at night blocking out the stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work off of tx hwy70, about a mile south from fm 283. i had a few minutes of down time, so i just look at the stars on a clear night, and i saw 3 white lights on the corners of a triangle object with a flashing/pulsating red light in the center. at 1st i thought it was an airplane, but it didn't make a sound, was flying way too low and slow for it to be. when it got closer, i was able to see the triangle shape when it blocked out the stars. all i could really think, was what the heck is that. i watched it for about 5 minutes, then i had to get back to work. i spent the rest of that night thinking about it.
content.summary: Observed triangle shape object

content.detailedDescription: It was around 130 am i was in bed sleeping.  i got up to use the bathroom and the light would not turn on.  as i was going back to my room l noticed a bright red-orange glow coming from my window.  i went to the window and looked out it i saw and object in my yard.  at this point my electric was not working tv would not go on no cable phone was acting really strange.  while i was at the window i saw 4-5 creatures slim like big eyes no mouth or ears.  they were walking towards my window and that's when a brighter light shined at me and my window.  i do not recall what happened over the next 3 hours but i do remember seeing 5 creatures in my house with me and a being aboard a spacecraft.  this has happened to me 3 or 4 times in my 28 years.
content.summary: Fire like object 4-5 creatures abduction 3 hours unaccounted for

content.detailedDescription: At 2:45 am on may 28, 2015 an orange glow out my north and south windows woke me.  i checked outside and saw it coming from the south.  heavily overcast sky after weird weather so i assumed it to be a weather phenom.  a dim flash, (like sheet lightning),  was pulsating at a little less than a second & this continued as long as the glow was around. (at least one and a quarter hours)  at 4:00 am  regular dark night resumed.  all just disappeared.  sheet lightning doesn't come that consistently.  it is more eratic.  the glow  had seemed to emanate  (sp) from a large area low in the south sky and then had moved slightly to the southwest and then back to first position.  no more sleep!
content.summary: Orange glow wakened me.  dim pulsing light flashes each second.  after an hour and 15 minutes all was dark again.

content.detailedDescription: Having just cleaned up from thanksgiving, myself and my wife were watching a little television. i went to our bedroom to change into sleepwear when an out-of-place light caught my attention. i've lived at this address my whole life so i'm used to all the lights and neighbors and goings on. this craft was the most amazing electric blue color. the shape of this object was like a christmas bell and it was slightly tilted forward as it floated slowly in a southerly direction. it appeared to be about three times taller than wide. it had a thin band of a row of squares going counter clock-wise at the base. two thirds of the way at the top of it, it had another thin band of the same shapes going clock-wise. mind-blown, i call and hurry to get my wife to come and see this thing. by the time she and i returned to the window, maybe 20 seconds. it had gone from a quarter-mile to what i guess is about 3 miles but had changed from blue to white and there were two others. they stayed stationary, they were what looked like to me shooting ping-pong ball like lights back and forth to each other. the light on far right got really bright and steadily descended out of sight, the other two stayed motionless. after what i guess to be about 2 or 3 minutes the 3rd object raises straight up they begin ping ponging lights back and forth again maybe two or three times each. then they began from right to left began to blink toward the west in about quarter mile intervals. till this day i had never witnessed anything like this and thought it was just hoopla, since this experience i have had two others. i just wanted to get some peace of mind by filing this report. i would really like to talk with someone about this experience and the two others i've had.
content.summary: Extremely unsettling.Felt very vulnerable.

content.detailedDescription:
In 2014 i was in turkey having a dinner at my hotel when i look up at the sky over the flames of chimera were i see i big glowing oval shaped object within the stars after looking at it for 10 to 20 minuets it suddenly zooms from the left end of the sky to the rite going so fast it was like it teleported from end to the other but behind the oval left a grey line that was there for at least 2 to 3 seconds.  then hole restaurant noticed the oval glowing shaped thing i don't now how to describe because i have been having trouble remembering it after that the oval got bigger about 3 times the size before it was a star size so quit small then it went up to 3 times the size then another 2 a couple minuets later before this object that is now looking like a this huge ball shaped object so brite it heart to look at. then it zoom over the flames and hover there for another 3 to 4 minuets before it it suddenly at lighting speed zoomed across to the left side of the sky so fast in a second it was there and in a second it was on the other side of the sky and then just hover again on the other side of the sky then in a second disappeared. i had trouble getting to sleep after that we all had trouble remembering what happened that night and today i now that i am missing things out but i simply cant remember the rest all i cant remember next is when i got back home to england  a black car with no plates and tinted windows was parked out side of my home on are grass normally we go and see who was in it and tell them to get off are grass but for the next 3 days they were there we didn't on the second day a police van drove passed it and ignored the fact that there was the car there and they could see the car now every time i look at the grass  see the black car and the only reason i am saying all this is because my friend who was with me the whole time remember some parts that i didn't and i remembered some parts that he didn't so we put are parts together and got this story him and me were both so fascinated by ufo's and trying to see them and to see what would happen after wards but now we both wished that we never  saw it but we both now me and my friend that we cant remember all of it and we both now that there is more and we are sorry but that is all we can remember and ever since that event him and me have been looking over are back and each other looking for any since of anything but nothing has happened that is why we have wirten this to you writing this it just feels like we are being watched.

we don't want to say are names but we are both 13 so last year we were 12.



when i say 20 witnesses that only the people in the restaurant i dont now how many people were at the flames also when it says time of event it was 10:00 pm local time turkey i could not fined turkey on the list also i think it was in antalya but over all it was over the flames of chimera.
content.summary: It cant be explained in a short description

content.detailedDescription:
When i was about eight years old, my friend [name removed\dr\cms] and i were walking from my house to hers which was a distance of about half a block.  in her backyard, her dad kept several hunting beagles and as we talked and walked, we heard the dogs start howling.  we thought that they had cornered a cat or that someone was bothering them so we hurried to check it out.  as we approached, the dogs fell silent. seconds later, when we arrived, we looked from the sidewalk directly back to the back yard where the dogs were and saw them looking upward, which caused us to look up to see what they were looking at  and it was then we saw the object.

hovering silently above a garage in her backyard was a dull silvery roughly triangular shaped object.  the triangle was longer on two sides with the corners of the triangle squared off.  the "point" where the two longer sides met was oriented toward the ground and there were gold/yellow lights at each of the corners.  close to the downward facing "point" was what appeared to be a protruding area with a red light.   even though the triangle shape was "facing" us, i still could tell the object had substance (wasn't flat) and that it extended back and was solid metallic.

we were transfixed and just watched it hover for several minutes before turning to each other and deciding to go get our brothers from a neighbor's house.  when we returned, the object was gone, the dogs were acting normally and our brothers thought we had made the story up!  

years later, long after [name removed/dr/cms]had moved away, i saw her at a nearby grocery store and she asked me if i remembered the time we saw the ufo.  her memory of what happened was almost exactly as i had remembered it.

the most profound part of this encounter to me was that back then, while i had heard of ufos, i had never seen pictures or heard of any which were not the standard "flying saucer" type. i was astounded many years later when i learned that similarly shaped ufos are fairly common.
content.summary: When i was about 8, a friend & i saw a silvery, roughly triangular shaped ufo hovering silently over the garage in her backyard.

content.detailedDescription:
Opened north french doors to a sky full of colored lights.  object was round and spacious as viewed by the naked eye. i called my stepdaughter and her girlfriend from school over to view it. they were having a sleepover.  i just spouted out, "it's a ufo!"  we watched it for about 30 minutes. it hovered for a long time.  i just chalked it up as being a ufo and got bored, i believe, and shut the door.  about 30 minutes later, i opened the doors again, and it was gone.  i never researched the sighting as in those days, we had no computer or internet.  i heard nothing from anyone else about the sighting, nor did i discuss it with anyone else.  i am currently watching hangar i this morning on the history channel and looked up mufon and saw that there was an area to report ufo sightings.  i'm sorry that this was experienced decades ago.  

[location and personal info removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Opened north french doors to a sky full of colored lights.  object was round and spacious.  it hovered for a long time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was only 12 to 13 years old during the time of the sightings. the first time i became aware of the red lights was when we were coming home on the activity school bus from a basketball game. red lights seemed to be following the bus. a group of girls were sitting at the back of the bus watching it. the lights did not actually move with the bus, but would appear stationary, disappear, and appear again about the same distance from the bus as it was when first seen. we thought it was curious but nothing came of it.
i lived 5 miles from town in a rural setting. one night while washing dishes, i looked out the window, which was on the north side of the house and there were red lights in the sky. there were 4 and they formed a perfect geometric square. they didn't shine so much as they just glowed. i immediately recognized them as being like the one following the school bus. so i went to the living room and drug my mother into the kitchen to see them. she was unimpressed and went back to watching tv. i continued to watch them and saw that occasionally one or more would disappear and appear elsewhere always in perfect geometric shape. this happened primarily in the sky. and after this i often saw them in the same place doing the same activity. however, after a time, i observed that one would disappear and appear at the vacant house approximately 1/4 mile up the road near the highway. it did not move around the house, but would appear at a window and stay a while, disappear and appear again on the porch. then disappear and appear again with the group of lights in the sky. it seemed to me that they were checking out the house...Gathering information maybe and then sharing it. that happened often. i thought it was curious that the light so often checked out the house. i always felt a little concern when it was checking out the house because we were so close and maybe they would come to our house too. and after we went to sleep who is to say they didn't. but i never witnessed that.
my bed was also on the north side of the house and often i would go to sleep watching the lights. this went on during a two year time span. i never saw the red lights again after that.
i have not been able to find anyone from that area that remembers seeing the light following the bus and my mother doesn't remember me showing them to her, (which i did more than once).
i really just want to know if anyone else has ever reported something like this.
content.summary: Red lights that appear in geometric form then disappear and appear elswhere with other red lights or near abbandoned buildings.

content.detailedDescription: Back in august 1994 while in mankato mn for my fathers funeral my wife and i and our son was driving back to ft mccoy wisc were i was in service while passing bye rochester mn along hyway 90 my wife and i notict a craft of some kind hovering and as we drove it started following us along 90 it followed all the way to the mississippi river while heading toward lacrosse wisc the craft went over our head and into the river valley and then it came out of the valley shined a bright light in our window that almost caused an accident with my car,i had found that there were alot of sightings around that time,my wife and i still talk about it.
content.summary: In august 1994 while in minnesota for my fathers funeral my wife and i and our son was heading back to ft mccoy wisc  were i was in the service  while passing bye rochester along 90 on the right side we notict a craft  hovering above the ground as we drov

content.detailedDescription: i was driving eastbound i-4 from lakeland florida to orlando florida. i use this route to go to work in orlando. as i was driving towards orlando (eastbound), i pass the rest area, i am driving in the middle lane, and as i am about to turn the radio station, i see a from the corner of my right eye ( i have a  peripheral vision) an orb appear. it was grey and dull. it might have had hexagonal designs like a golf ball. i saw it right before it made a complete stop above the tree line. as i gave it a full look ( and thought "wtf") it headed in the opposite way i was driving, almost like it knew i saw it. it moved from a stationary stand point to the opposite direction so fast it looked like <)or like a " haruken" from ryu in street fighter. it was a clear day and sunny, it was not a bird because they glide and flap their wings. totally advanced technology.
content.summary: Small orb appeared above tree line for a sec and changed direction so fast it it looked like orb changed shape

content.detailedDescription: Watched it for 20 mins so far up no way it was a plane a bird a weather balloon or swamp gas. however my iphone just didn't take a good picture. grabbed my binoculars and watched for 10 more mins had two protruding rotating bars/arms and then bang it was gone.... just gone! second time in my life i've seen something i can't explain
content.summary: Clear day nothing blocking view able to observe for more than 30-40 mins

content.detailedDescription:
Taking a smoke break at work and saw a metallic, triangular craft with three white lights at each point of the triangle (one lead light), and a blinking red light in the center.

i noticed it because it was the only thing in the sky at the moment.

i assumed it was an airplane at first, since i see airplanes out here all the time.  but as i watched it, the shape that the white lights outlined appeared more and more to be a solid triangle.  also, i don't believe i have seen airplanes travel this particular north-to-south path almost directly over the building.  (i've seen west-to-east and east-to-west far south of the building's location, and southwest-to-north-east a bit north of the building's location, but never north-to-south almost directly over the building.)

the craft made no sound that i could hear, and the usual city sounds were almost non-existent.  (it was around 5:15 am.)  the craft traveled from north to south, slowly, in a straight line.  i watched it for maybe 15 seconds, until it's path took it beyond the treeline/building line.

as i watched it, i was initially convinced i was watching a regular airliner flying a little lower than usual, but as i watched it, the light pastern reminded me of a ufo sighting or two i had heard.

my cell phone isn't a smart-phone, so i didn't take pictures or video.

i didn't feel any excitement or fear or anything until after the craft disappeared beyond my line of sight.  then, as i considered that i might have been watching an actual unidentified flying object, i felt a little excited.

i am not 100% certain what i saw was a commercial airplane, but i am reporting this just in case.
content.summary: Metallic triangle with 3 white lights and a blinking red light

content.detailedDescription: This is not the first sighting of craft on our cr farm. there is a huge oval craft that comes to a certain area of the farm and hovers there often well over an hour. it comes during the night. the object i am sending to you now was taken during the day. it was matalic with a gent of a red glow around it. my partner took the photo with his cell phone. i am back in the states dealing with cancer, he sent me the photo and said, "now they are coming in the day.
content.summary: I own a farm in costa rica with a costa rican partner, this photo was taken on the farm.

content.detailedDescription:
Well though i have been a ufo researcher for years i was not expecting this one.  i was  not looking for any, not even thinking about them this was sunday night may 3rd, i was actually taking pictures and video of a very beautiful moonrise that evening over lake tillery from the fishing dock in mount morrow state park.  it was not long after sundown around 8;20 maybe. i took some photos of the moon from the parking lot with my digital camera a nikkon d5300,  

then i and my husband walked onto the fishing dock to get some better angles of the moon rising and reflecting in the lake water.

i took a couple of stills first(my camera does stills and short video segments of 10 minute increments).  and when i snapped he first or second still a sudden intensely bright pin point light streaked across both my camera viewfinder moving so fast it seemed to have a streak behind it like just fast, and then gone. i also saw it in my vision regular vision as well as on the viewfinder.  i said to my husband "did you see that" he sort of did but suggested it was a bug streaking across across the camera.  i had switched to video by then and since it went by so fast i shrugged it off.  i have seen ufos before and this was not as spectacular as some i have seen, so this would have not even been a memory by now if i had not caught the object in one of the frames of digital shots  snapped. that was a surprise, it proved it was really there and was not some kind of strange insect.  it can be seen as a fuzzy white ball of light to the above and left of the moon in one frame. 

and it appeared to streak downward and vanish into the treeline and that can be seen in a second frame maybe, not sure the moon is not reflecting but have 3rd photo that was either snapped first or last in the series of 3 pics to show what area looked like before or after object streaked past.   i was pleased to find i caught this little streak of something that went by so fast.  the wooded area where it appeared to go down is in montgomery county likely in the uwharrie national forest. 

this is not my first rodeo.  i have seen ufos before and my family has along history with them i have lectured on them sometimes in public.  i even took former nc state mufon director george fawcet's ufo course many years ago.  i cant say what this object that streaked by like greased lightening was, but i can confidently say what it was not, it was not a plane, chopper, balloon shooting star, helicopter, satellite, meteorite etc, i have seen all those ting many times in my life. this was different.
content.summary: It was a trek of light so fast i barley saw it only blieve i did cause i got it on camera anddid not realize this until checking camera data later

content.detailedDescription: I was attending college in vermillion alberta at the time and had just arrived back and parked in the parking lot across the road from the school facing the field it was about 2am and my truck was running but i had my lights off i was rolling a smoke and was looking down at my paper and tobacco mid roll and light ahead of me caught my attention so i looked up and it took me a few moments to even comprehend what i was seeing but the best way to describe it would be these i pod shaped objects seemingly white with one side the top half had about a 5 by 5 pattern of round lights. and the rest blank but they were spinning on a vertical axis hovering across the field at a good rate of speed not much higher than ground level they were coming out of nowhere but all from the same place in the field they gave off the strangest light i've ever seen most of them were flickering in and out of transparency and all disappearing at different points throughout the field no sound whatsoever and they were no more than 500 feet from me a rough estimate in height about ten feet tall i just sat there speechless trying to think of any logical explanation to explain what i was seeing i watched for at least 5 minutes i kept thinking am i really seeing this or am i going crazy and all of a sudden from the point they were appearing there was a crazy green flare of light and my rollie still in hand went flying and i was cursing what the frick! holy crap!There's no way! i was freaking out at this point the light was probally about 50 feet  high flaring crazier than the craziest northern lights i've ever seen the light slowly moved in the same direction as the "pods" this went on for 5-10 seconds and then it just stopped and as that stopped it all stopped and it was normal again i just sat there for about 2 hours completely baffled  about what i had just witnessed   i'm not sure if i was unable to move or if i was just in shock definitely the craziest thing i've ever seen
content.summary: Spinning i pod shapes moving across field

content.detailedDescription:
At 2am, i was watching a flickering white star that would occasionally flicker red. then a white light shot out of it to the east. a couple minutes later i saw another white light soot out of it to the east, but slightly south. they both looked like a shooting star, but originated at the flickering star.
at 02:20am, directly south, at 35°-40°, i saw a brilliant flash of blueish white light. it only lasted a second.
i've seen these flickering "stars" before in my back yard.
one such star i saw every night for months. one night i noticed 5 of them spread out in the sky around hutch. they were all about the same altitude, the same brightness, and they would occasionally flicker red at different times.
i never saw anything shoot out of them. i thought they were space junk or possibly a satellite.
after the other night, i now believe they are mother ships
or space stations of some type that we do not know about.
these lights left the flickering star at light speed and had a trail like a shooting star behind them. they vanished
directly after leaving the "flickering star".
something strange is going on here and i want to know what it is. have you heard any reports like this before.
         thank you
         [name removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Flickering star ejected 2 lights.

content.detailedDescription: I have many of these photos this was a shot that was not seen until we looked at them on the computer. all of these images happen when a green line was taken by my son. it is a very large green line that was captured by my son from his smartphone. not sure what they were put after the green line picture these other objects showed up.
content.summary: A disc with a round gray on top and black on the bottom

content.detailedDescription: While driving northbound on route 104 from perry township to middleburg noticed an orange star like object the orange was very unnatural almost a construction warning light orange.  the color caught my attention there was no blinking or flashing. i lost sight over trees due to turn in road saw again about 2 mins later and again lost sight i crested a hill with a clearing and light was gone i could not tell if it was moving but it should still have been visible at clearing but was nowhere to be found in sky.  this struck me as very odd as stars or aircraft don't just disappear.
content.summary: While driving north on route 104 at 2332 i noticed a bright orange star like object.  the orange was very unnatural which caught my attention lost it over trees in a turn saw it again and when i came to the crest of a hill with clearing it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Like i wrote above it happened during the night i was young at the time maybe 8or9 when this happened.It happened at the summer cottage
content.summary: I was sleeping when woke up to light,then saw 3 human like figures in the room they where looking at my parents sleeping

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home going down 117 in bridgton, just before the 302 junction, i was on the top of the hill, where the road faces south. the storm clouds were still heavy in the sky, and you could not see past them. this light just sat their, larger than an air tower light. it didn't blink, but it was sparkly. it was directly down the road but obviously below the cloud line. no other light could be seen, at all last night. this thing sat there for a good 2-3 minutes, and began to fade as i turned down the road i needed. i could not spot it after that. it was really bizarre. a golden light with heavy clouds above and behind it, was definitely a ufo.
content.summary: A square golden light, solid in the middle
